name: Exports
description: Accounting-friendly CSV exports with hooks for future QuickBooks and ERP connectors.

prd.problemStatement: Integrating with accounting systems requires exporting financial data in compatible formats. CSV exports with proper structure enable manual or automated integration.
userStories: As an accountant, I want CSV exports so that I can import to our accounting system
As a superintendent, I want scheduled exports so that accounting data is always current
